THE DIGITAL SOUTH @ UNC

ABOUT DS@UNC

The Digital South is a collaboration between the University Libraries and the Southern Futures Initiative at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. The Digital South aims to foster collaborative and meaningful engagement between scholars that are using digital methods to study the American South.

This website highlights scholars and their projects. Navigate by accessing the Scholars, Projects, or Special Collections links, then browse or filter through the featured entries.
